SCTX:
Begin ColonyAenar

;controls timing and variables  for Stalhrim armor crafting
;also contains Journal update for killing all three nords in quest CO_8a

short OnPCHitMe
short scuirass
short sgreaves
short slpauld
short srpauld
short slbracer
short srbracer
short sboots
short shelm
short busy
short currentday
short localdayspassed
short nolore

if ( busy == 1 )
	if ( currentday != day )
		set currentday to day
		set localdayspassed to ( localdayspassed + 1 )
	endif
endif

if ( OnPCHitMe == 1 )
	"Hidar"->SetFight 100
	"Hidar"->StartCombat Player
	"Graring"->SetFight 100
	"Graring"->StartCombat Player
endif


End ColonyAenar
